Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this Skill you can use your voice to switch lights ands loads on and off, set the temperature, open and close windows, start scenes and much more.

In order to use this Skill you must have a OHMe system and a dedicated account.
No additional device is required, your OHMe system already has everything you need to connect it to Alexa.

Once you connect your account to the Skill you don't have to do anything else, the synchronization of the devices takes place automatically through our Cloud.
